title: Skyfall (THE 8 Solo)
lyricstimestamp:
[00:07.40]Like a feather
[00:10.50]I wanna let go
[00:14.20]갇혀있는
[00:17.30]창 틈새로 본
[00:21.00]파란 벽지
[00:24.20]구름 하나둘
[00:27.90]짙어지네
[00:31.10]Tearing it down
[00:35.50]Where to go
[00:38.40]귀에 익은 목소리
[00:41.90]다시 날 던져
[00:48.30]Sky fallin' easy
[00:51.70]Lookin' forward
[00:55.30]나의 눈에 비친
[00:58.70]飞鸟不留下痕迹
[01:02.00]Steppin' on the ceiling
[01:05.40]Lookin' for a reason
[01:08.90]눈을 감아 깊이
[01:12.10]소음 속에 잠들지
[01:15.80]빛바랜 상철 끌어안고 입 맞춰
[01:22.40]희미하게 비치는 줄기의 단서
[01:29.20]어제 받아둔 전화에게
[01:32.80]Now it's time to say goodbye
[01:36.10]금세 돌아온 그 한마디
[01:39.70]That is always up to you
[01:44.10]Where to go
[01:47.00]귀에 익은 목소리
[01:50.50]다시 날 던져
[01:56.70]Sky fallin' easy
[02:03.60]Lookin' forward
[02:03.90]나의 눈에 비친
[02:07.00]飞鸟不留下痕迹
[02:10.60]Steppin' on the ceiling
[02:14.00]Lookin' for a reason
[02:17.50]눈을 감아 깊이
[02:20.70]소음 속에 잠들지
lyrics:
Lyric SEVENTEEN - Skyfall (THE 8 Solo)

[Romanization]

Like a feather
I wanna let go
gathyeoinneun
chang teumsaero bon

paran byeokji
gureum hanadul
jiteojine
Tearing it down

Where to go
gwie igeun moksori
dasi nal deonjyeo

Sky fallin’ easy
Lookin’ forward
naui nune bichin
飞鸟不留下痕迹

Steppin’ on the ceiling
Lookin’ for a reason
nuneul gama gipi
soeum soge jamdeulji

bitbaraen sangcheol kkeureoanggo ip matchwo
huimihage bichineun julgiui danseo

eoje badadun jeonhwaege
Now it’s time to say goodbye
geumse doraon geu hammadi
That is always up to you

Where to go
gwie igeun moksori
dasi nal deonjyeo

Sky fallin’ easy
Lookin’ forward
naui nune bichin
飞鸟不留下痕迹

Steppin’ on the ceiling
Lookin’ for a reason
nuneul gama gipi
soeum soge jamdeulji

[Hangeul]

Like a feather

I wanna let go

갇혀있는

창 틈새로 본



파란 벽지

구름 하나둘

짙어지네

Tearing it down



Where to go

귀에 익은 목소리

다시 날 던져



Sky fallin’ easy

Lookin’ forward

나의 눈에 비친

飞鸟不留下痕迹



Steppin’ on the ceiling

Lookin’ for a reason

눈을 감아 깊이

소음 속에 잠들지



빛바랜 상철 끌어안고 입 맞춰

희미하게 비치는 줄기의 단서



어제 받아둔 전화에게

Now it’s time to say goodbye

금세 돌아온 그 한마디

That is always up to you



Where to go

귀에 익은 목소리

다시 날 던져



Sky fallin’ easy

Lookin’ forward

나의 눈에 비친

飞鸟不留下痕迹



Steppin’ on the ceiling

Lookin’ for a reason

눈을 감아 깊이

소음 속에 잠들지
